text: Euspondylus acutirostris, the sharp-snouted sun tegus, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Venezuela. ==References== Category:Euspondylus Category:Reptiles of Venezuela Category:Endemic fauna of Venezuela Category:Reptiles described in 1863 Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Peters
title: Euspondylus acutirostris
